localString.value: Loosely nailed, this wooden crate appears intended for temporary storage.
Loosely nailed, this wooden crate appears intended for temporary storage.
Rats nibble on the corpse's fingers and scurry about his ears. It looks like the body has been here awhile.
In death, the face of the bare-chested man seems frozen with fear. You wonder what it was that killed him.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of iron ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of iron ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of tinstone ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of silver ore.
